name: garmin-workout-stats
description: A browser extension to view strength workout data and statistics from Garmin Connect

scripts.test: echo "Error: no tests implemented yet" && exit 1
scripts.firefox:build: cp src/manifest_v2.json src/manifest.json && web-ext build --source-dir src --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts/firefox
scripts.firefox:start: cp src/manifest_v2.json src/manifest.json && web-ext run --source-dir src
scripts.chrome:build: cp src/manifest_v3.json src/manifest.json && web-ext build --source-dir src --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts/chrome
